website_summaries.verdict: The best budget laptop case for the Microsoft Surface that offers unique functionality for the smaller price.
pros: Case hugs the curves of the Surface's exterior
Extra flaps unfold to create a good surface for additional accessories such as a mouse or additional number keypad
cons: The inside of the cover can start to fray into little strands of fabric after some basic usage

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for Surface Book
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived today and it is just as I expected except that it's just slightly more tan than in the product picture, but I still like it. It's a good snug fit for my Surface Book. I've clipped my Surface Pen on the outer pouch and that works great. In the photo it looks like there is a dark spot in the center, but it's just a shadow from the pen inside the case. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. At first, I was a little skeptical to buy this product because I wasn’t sure how a case without a zipper would protect my surface. It does just fine, and the upper leather is very easy to put in the cover so that it’s closed. Some other review it looked like it is hand made, I completely disagree, it looks very professionally made (and I am picky, such a thing would disturb me if it were true). The color doesn’t exactly match the red/purple keyboard but it’s pretty closw so it won’t bother you. Overall great value for the money. Also very light. Definitely doesn’t fit the charger.
customer_reviews.author: noway

customer_reviews.title: Basic, OK cover.  Aesthetics are a bit "home-made".
customer_reviews.text: This cover is OK. Price seems a little high for what it is. It protects against scrapes and scratches mostly; It's not going to do much for drops or rough hits inside a backpack. Using the flap as a mouse pad is impractical for me; too close to the laptop and not enough space. For me, this cover has a bit of a "my mom made it from Hobby Lobby / remnants from an upholstery store" vibe to it; it's not horrible but it may not be the best for you if you are picky about aesthetics or work in a more professional office environment.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Travieso

customer_reviews.title: The pictures of this item make it look like it is a fairly decent quality item
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this item make it look like it is a fairly decent quality item. Do not be mislead or deceived like I was by the pictures. The quality of this item is equal to you wrapping your Surface laptop with felt from a craft store. I'll keep it for now because I need it to be protected better than just having nothing on it. But I will be shopping for a higher quality case for my Surface laptop which I think is one of the most beautiful machines ever made by Microsoft and I think it should be enshrined in a quality case.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight protection
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect my laptop when carrying it in a backpack or work bag. I wanted something that would be lightweight and not bulky but still protect it from scratches. I got exactly what I was looking for! It’s not padded, so if you need something to physically protect it, this may not be for you. But I carry my laptop in a backpack or shoulder bag where it doesn’t really move around, it just needed protection from scratches. The wine red color is pretty. The case fits like a glove over the Microsoft Surface laptop. I’ve been very pleased and would highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: RuthieB

customer_reviews.title: Very good sleeve for protection
customer_reviews.text: I have the Microsoft Surface 3 laptop 13.5" and I bought this sleeve to help protect my laptop in my bags. I have a laptop bag but sometimes I prefer to not take it and having this sleeve helps to protect my laptop and accessories in any bag I can fit it in. I would only recommend it for keeping your laptop from getting scratched while in your bag, I would not recommend dropping your laptop or anything like that while in the sleeve. It is lightweight and I highly recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for Surface X Pro - felt to felt friction will make this impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: good quality case. However, it does not fit the Surface X Pro - it's very tight if you even get it in. Let alone adding additional stuff in the side pocket. No way. I've stretched this to the point of close to breaking. Still no go. The fact that the type cover is felt doesn't help either. Once you get it into the case you cannot get it out without spending some time to carefully remove it. Friction is your enemy. Doesn't matter how you put it into the case, the only way it reasonable fits is without the type cover. That's a No-Go and I will return.
customer_reviews.author: DerAusgewanderte

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well made and perfect fit for a Microsoft Laptop 3
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the thickness of this sleeve and how much protection it offers. The flap stays snugly in place when you fold it into the sleeve. The seams are tightly stitched on the outside giving the sleeve good strength. My husband was so impressed with the sleeve that he ordered the larger one in black for his Dell XPS 15.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great slip for my Surface Go + Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10" Surface Go. It fits perfectly and it's easy to use/understand. The front slip is where I keep my phone/surface pen/headphones. The charger will NOT fit into this front pocket, it's pretty tight. The slip protects the screen but it is not soft to the touch. I have not utilized the slip for the mouse. I am a college student. I was originally looking for a case that would make it so if I dropped it it would be fine, but decided that carrying this with my textbooks would be more efficient and make me less prone to leaving a hefty case somewhere. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiMay

customer_reviews.title: Slim and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve is slim and lightweight which is what I wanted. If you want something sturdy for "drop-ability" this is not it. Get something like an otter box instead. Also, even though you CAN cram the power cord in there and maybe a flat surface mouse, it makes it bulky and isn't designed for it. Just FYI. It does what I want but if you need those features, look elsewhere. I like the flap that can be used as a mousepad!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Matches Surface 3 Laptop Cobalt Blue
customer_reviews.text: Matches the Surface 3 laptop in cobalt blue perfectly. My laptop fits well. I can fit my charger and wireless mouse in the extra pocket. Only downside is the flap that can be used as a mouse pad is not like how it is in the stock photos; mine is a greenish/gray/cream color. However, the make shift mouse pad works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: YAY! A sleeve with NO zipper!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop sleeve is the perfect size for a 15 inch Microsoft Surfacebook 2. I love the flap that can double as a mouse pad. It keeps crumbs and crap off my laptop when it's in my bag. It has NO zipper - which is a HUGE PLUS because zippers are loud and if they break it leaves your laptop sleeve useless.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: High Quality SLIM Sleeve for Surface Pro X
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sleeve because I was looking for a high quality slim leave the would protect my Surface Pro X, but also fit in a relatively small messenger bag without taking up much space. On my original purchase, the sleeve looked great and felt high quality, but was a bit small despite being advertised for the Surface Pro X. In contacting the seller, they quickly rectified the situation. The redesigned sleeve fits much better, but is still snug enough so it doesn't take up much more space in my bag than the naked device. Will spend some more time with it and will adjust my rating accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Caution for Microsoft surface laptop 3, 13.5
customer_reviews.text: It specifies that this sleeve fits the Microsoft surface laptop 3, 13.5 inch but unfortunately it does not. I couldn't get the laptop to fit at all. I really wanted to like this product and was so excited to use it... But I was sadly disappointed. I never leave reviews on anything but if anyone else has a Microsoft surface I would suggest getting a larger one like a 14 inch and make sure you check the INTERNAL dimensions to make sure your laptop fits, not just the external dimensions. Pictures are of my laptop directly on top of the sleeve; the laptop is clearly larger. Even side by side it's beyond a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dishawne Rose

customer_reviews.title: Soft, pretty and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve case is very pretty and nice soft material. Definitely good value for the money! I put a hard case on my Microsoft Pro 7 and could still fit this sleeve over it, it’s nice and tight. Makes me feel like my device is secure and protected. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elina Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, one set back
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy everything about it but one thing is evident and needs to be be taken into consideration....space. It looks like you can fit your computer chords in this but to the contrary. It flap is meant to be tucked inside and when you have items inside the second compartment it’s impossible. Bottom line...great quality, snug, and worth the price, but if you plan on storing additionally items in this like the chords or other devices I would look for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Pad

customer_reviews.title: Pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black and it looks exactly as pictured in the photos. Though nothing that will protect from drops or anything drastic like that,its super sleek and well made. I actually did purchase a thin shell case for my Microsoft Surface Laptop and it was a bit snug but still fit. The charger does not fit so well but a simple phone charge or even a phone without a case will fit snuggly in the front pocket. I
customer_reviews.author: @alinacryystal

customer_reviews.title: This sleeve is great! Its easy to get my surface book 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve is great! Its easy to get my surface book 2 in and out of the sleeve and does a great job preventing it from getting scratched. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is that it would've been great if the front pocket was just a little roomier, as my Microsoft Precision mouse wont fit in the pocket. Currently, I use the front sleeve to hold my surface pen and a few cables, but the lack of a flap or something to cover the front pocket has me wary of losing my pen someday.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Sunday

customer_reviews.title: fits surface book- cool design
customer_reviews.text: different style from other sleeve type tablet holders. I like the slim design. will not hold mouse or cords, this is more to put in a larger bag, or carry into a meeting. the burgundy is brown-red. very professional looking, fits the surface book perfectly. I like not having a zipper to break, which has trashed my other sleeves after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: mark.nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is slim. The case is flimsy and feels cheap, but my main purpose is to use it to transport my surface from place to place. I paid $18 for the sleeve - a little over priced for the materials used.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Okayish.  Not too practical.
customer_reviews.text: I use the tablet everyday for work, so I haven't found great use of this product, other than to store it at night. It doesn't look like it will protect the tablet from fall damage and the front pocket is too thin, the keyboard will not fit. So, will look for something else I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Hourruitiner

customer_reviews.title: Love this sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I got a Surface Pro for Christmas and wanted to be able to keep it safe while in my bag. This does the trick and also looks so nice. My Surface and keyboard fit well inside without taking up a ton of room in the rest of my bag. There’s an extra pocket section that I could keep the power cord in, but I felt like it looked a little too bulky so I’ve just kept it empty so far
customer_reviews.author: Molly N

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, protects my Microsoft Surface Laptop well, and the fold-out mouse pad is surprisingly useful. We have two; the second is for a Microsoft Surface Go. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Feola

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, refined, well-made, looks better in person!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews, but this is worth writing one. Beautiful and looks better in person. More importantly, it protects my laptop and keeps it looking like new. It fits perfectly with my Surface Laptop 2, I’ve had this for months now and still looks great, no creases from folding the flap all the time. I love the flap that turns into a mouse pad as well. You can actually tuck the Microsoft “flat” mouse (surface mouse?) in where the felt is, but I keep the charger and the mouse in a separate pouch. It looks beautiful tucked in my business tote. And what a deal it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I did my good research in laptop wallets I was really confused i want the quality , light weight , And the classy design , I choose this item and I found everything that I looking for. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sultana

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on a better case.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that this case has so many good reviews. I have the silver surface laptop and it fits in the case fine but it does not fit all of the extra things shown in the image above. It will barely fit the laptop and the charger. The most annoying thing about this case is that everytime I pull my laptop out of it there are black smears all over the laptop. I should have just spent a little extra money on a decent case instead of this "cute" one. This laptop was way too expensive for me to continue to use a case that makes it completely dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Overall 4 stars just b/c you can't really fit anything other than the Surface go in it. So I have to carry my charger separately. Overall though, its held up really well looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly how it is displayed. I bought this product because of all the great reviews. Now the inside fabric is not as soft as I thought it would be. It feels very much like lower quality leather but overall, the sleeve does it's job! For the overall price, I'm very happy with it! There can be improvements made to make the inside of the material softer so it doesn't scratch my laptop (mine came with a really hard and scratched up black area on the flap so I'm afraid to fold that alongside my laptop).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Surface fits great. I bought the matching blue MSFT mouse and I can even tuck that into the sleeve. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sato

customer_reviews.title: It is a stunning leeve
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new sleeve case for my Surface Book 2 15". It fitted like a glove. I bought the blue one and the color is pretty. I have my SB2 in a plastic hard case and still if fitted in the WALNEW sleeve protector. The material and the sewing does not look like it is going to last, it looks delicate (fragile) for someone like me that constantly takes out/puts away its computer (5 times a day). Overall, great quality and value, I will definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Z.Dorado

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, minimal, and keeps out the dust.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 13.5 in surface book perfectly. Was looking for a simple sleeve to keep my laptop in while it's in my backpack and keep the dust out at the same time. The sleeve and laptop fit perfectly into the laptop compartment of my north face recon backpack. I wouldn't use it as a standalone sleeve for protection but as a sleeve to keep dirt out I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin E.

customer_reviews.title: Very snug fit
customer_reviews.text: A very snug fit for the surface pro X with a keyboard. The second pocket is basically non usable. The "mouse pad" is very small. The product feels like it is made out of a cheap Styrofoam or plastic.
customer_reviews.author: QueBonita

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Microsoft surface laptop perfectly. Looks nice and no problems with durability (had it almost a year now).
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. It's simple, sleek, and the black seems classic. Nothing overpriced or bulky. Serves the purpose well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve fits my Microsoft surface laptop 2 perfectly. It is lightweight and will protect from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: SaraB

customer_reviews.title: Really Love It
customer_reviews.text: So when I originally bought it I was kind of disappointed but it really grew on me! Perfectly fits my surface go and my surface mouse, an hdmi cable, my pen, and a thin notebook/pen. I use it daily and it perfectly matches the red surface go type cover. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie Rizzi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured - cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop case. It fits my surface laptop (2017 model, 13.5 inch) perfectly and looks exactly as pictured - very cute! It's not a hard case so it won't protect against drops or anything but water and coffee wick off of it and it's perfect to protect against bumps and scratches. It's also lightweight and thin so throwing it in my work bag is easy! Couldn't be happier with it, it's exactly what I wanted. The fold in flap that serves as a mouse pad is a really nice feature also!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits surface laptop 2. Looks great and makes me feel better about carrying my laptop in my bag with my books without worrying about scratches.
customer_reviews.author: WynterRae

customer_reviews.title: Simple and well made
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Microsoft Go perfectly. Does not add a lot of additional bulk or weight for travel. Really like the flip out as a mousepad. Has come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Review

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sleeve for my Surface Book 2
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are 2 pockets - so you can split the surface and carry each in a separate pocket. Very good quality of construction and materials. I use this daily both inside and outside of my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: down2xroads

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit with a case on
customer_reviews.text: Well-made product, but I had to return it because my Surface Laptop 2 has a hard shell on it. The computer does not fit well with a case on it. Additionally, the pink color is not as bright as the stock photo. It is more of a beige color. However, the product is well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Melnick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for over a year as of October 18, 2019. As a full time student who used his laptop every day, I use this product several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Calixte

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Mouse pad part portion great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the sleeve because it’s made out of leather and looks more elegant, it fits my computer fine but I wish I had more room in the front pocket or even a separate matching care yours for my charger and computer accessories like my arc mouse. I will use it to hold my wireless earbuds and storage drive, there is enough room For that. The product is great. Also to note, I spilled water on it and the seams are not waterproof, to say the least, I panicked for my computer but got to it in time.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great with surface go. Fits fine with Microsoft type cover
customer_reviews.author: tztex

customer_reviews.title: nice quality with light weight
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfy with this case aesthetically and the quality is better than my imagination. I like how it has a "invisible" mouse pad so it is also very useful while I'm using my laptop. The only thing makes it imperfect is the front pocket cannot fit the charger and mouse, but I can ignore this compare to other advantages of this product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yingshan Fu

customer_reviews.title: Surface laptop 3 fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: i only put my laptop in this case and nothing else, because anything else would make it bulged a bit. It is exactly as described and is nice and soft on the inside. if you want something sleek and slim cover for your laptop (surface laptop 3 in my case), this is the soft case for you!
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Best TABLET CASE
customer_reviews.text: absolutely the best tablet holder. it's Slim but the leathers easily stretchable that you truly can fit more items . Worth the value and made to last. Best review I've given in accessories
customer_reviews.author: DaPnkDmd

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this little case. So light weight and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary C

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY! DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is just a bag for your computer. I have a 13.5 surface book just like it says in the description and it did not fit well. Also it really doesn't protect your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Youdonotknowme

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it would be cheap Chinese build quality, but it's surprising nice.
customer_reviews.author: sum hung guy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that it’s super flimsy. My laptop is a surface Pro 2 and it doesn’t fit well in this case like I assumed it would. If I could I’d probably return it
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, could heat your device.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and durable. I really like the pad for your mouse. Nevertheless, if you place your computer underneath it starts to heat up quickly. So, if you have an old device, it could damage your battery even more.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: So cute and perfectly fits my Surface Pro!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 tries for a case that would actually fit, this one is a winner! Very cute, holds my Surface Pro plus keyboard snug and secure, front pocket allows me to carry my phone or small tablet... exactly what I was looking for! Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: A.I.Hook

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!! LOVE IT! Protects my Surface Laptop, lightweight, &looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way just let my surface laptops needed / Light weight looks great but is very inexpensive, Protect the computer and just looks great
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's a little rugged not too bad. I haven't tried it on my Surface but it looks like it will fit just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The flap opens as a mousepad. It’s very nice looking and I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Chucky from Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I put my go inside it anytime I go anywhere with it and it holds up really well. I was nervous just seeing pictures from the seller but it’s super cute and great quality in person.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's a great color, protects my laptop, and easy to use and fits my laptop perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice case and my computer fits tighly. My only issue is that it looks more like vinyl that imitation leather.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great and useful product. Works very well! Very durable and cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight surface pro case
customer_reviews.text: Love it 🥰! So light and easy to put in my backpack 🎒.
customer_reviews.author: ASL63

customer_reviews.title: This thing is really cool
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like how the covering flap open to become a mouse-pad. I wish there was a way to fasten it more tightly but it is a minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary C. Hunchar

customer_reviews.title: Georgous!But...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous but it’s so hard to get my notebook out of this sleeve. I’m not sire it’s suitable for holding any accessories as was indicated unless you don’t mind the sleeve being stretched out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tenece

customer_reviews.title: Good but looks slightly different than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a built in mouse pad. The front pocket is also really roomy. The fit is snug without being overly tight. The only minor complaint I would have is that it looks slightly different from the picture. It's a darker blue and it also doesn't really have the pattern in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surfacebook 2 perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love it Beautiful color, a little darker than the stock photo but still pretty Fits perfect And many complements on it already
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nicely
customer_reviews.text: This product fits my surface book very nicely, but the built in mousepad always has a little tilt upwards and you have to flatten it out as much as possible before using (It is a very thoughtful feature that I use often). Other than that, it is a very nice product and I do reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Only really fits the screen, not the keyboard as ...
customer_reviews.text: Only really fits the screen, not the keyboard as well. It's very tight to fit the screen and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: zim

customer_reviews.title: Just protects against....dust.
customer_reviews.text: Its just weird shape. no strap. I ended up getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Microsoft Go
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Microsoft Go perfectly, with room in the outer sleeve for a few pieces of paper. Do not plan to carry a charger in it tho. It’s pretty slim.
customer_reviews.author: T. Criswell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Surface Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good sleeve to prevent scratches on my Surface. Great value and purpose.
customer_reviews.author: John Mymryk

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pink one for my Surface Pro 7, like the color!
customer_reviews.author: s504262

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, and it fits the surface book 13.5 and the pen! At first the pen sticks out but you just have to fold the flap over it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing protection
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Feels cheap Disappointing for protection for my Surface which cost over 1K.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Gebhard

customer_reviews.title: Can be better
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but the edge is sharp for the notebook surface
customer_reviews.author: Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small sized covers.
customer_reviews.text: It is good as a small size case and you can fit it in a small bag, it has a partition that is helpful for putting papers but not really useful to put your charger.
customer_reviews.author: M.p

customer_reviews.title: a small problem in what is othewise perfect
customer_reviews.text: The color of the case is very consistent with the color of the keyboard. It looks like a set, very good. The shortage is that the mouse pad is too rough which means the mouse can’t use very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Yiyuan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing case. Was skeptical based on previous reviews but the laptop I have (Microsoft Surfave 2, 2018) fit perfectly snug. Obviously not enough space for a mouse or charger but that’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Samara Bharath

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits surface go perfectly, the extra pocket provides space for the mouse and pen
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Garland

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly my surface pro with the pen attached to it. Before buying, check the size, they sell different sizes. Durable, good material, and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Trevisan

customer_reviews.title: The outside material is nice, but the inside material is very fibrous and ...
customer_reviews.text: The outside material is nice, but the inside material is very fibrous and will leave little strands of fabric on all over your computer, especially if you have any stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Faelin McCaley Landy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit thicker and doesn’t lay plush with my laptop but that might be the size of the laptop
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT CASES OR EVEN SLEEVES. THEY OFFER NO PROTECTION AT ALL. I HAVE FOLDERS THAT ARE THICKER THAN THESE PIECES OF THIN MATERIAL SEWN TOGETHER. I WOULD NOT BUY OR RECOMMEND. I HAVE RETURNED THE ITEMS AS THEY LOOK NOTHING LIKE THE PICTURE AND ARE NOT AS DESCRIBED. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Q MCKINLEY

customer_reviews.title: Slim and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, love the versatility of this case. Slim and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: David Small

customer_reviews.title: other ppl like it. I got it bc its cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: gets the job done. other ppl like it. I got it bc its cheap and just going in my bag. satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I do not need a case with a handle or anything to carry my laptop, so this is perfect. It matches my Surface laptop perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaV

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: The Surface Laptop 3 case I received is sleek, professional and handy with the mouse pad that acts as a fold-in cover so my items don’t fall out of the case! Highly recommend based on quality and and value.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Palanca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve looks and feels great. A perfect fit for my surface laptop 2. Stop thinking about it... Just get it
customer_reviews.author: hector gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Surface Laptop (1st gen) fits perfectly in the sleeve. However, the side pocket is not wide enough to fit almost any type of item. Anything wider than your phone is probably not going to fit. Overall, the quality is good and the sleeve does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Rosendo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is very sleek, and is awesome for traveling. My Microsoft Surface fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Its cute and I feel like it'll protect my laptop nicely
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and I feel like it'll protect my laptop nicely ! It doesn't clip or anything , you just fold it in like an envelope. The marble thing is some sort of material but its great!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what i needed, even fits with the pen magnetically attached
customer_reviews.author: Chris Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Protects the Surface well. The foldout flap serves well ...
customer_reviews.text: Protects the Surface well. The foldout flap serves well as mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I can fit my laptop mouse and kindle perfect will definitely purchase in another color. Looks very nice and the quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Posada

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The surface and mouse fit perfectly. The power supply will fit in as well, although it's a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Dowling

customer_reviews.title: A bit too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it to for my surface book2 and it was a bit too big. Very nice quality though, overall, it was a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fayco Garibay

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for Microsoft surface 13.3. I need to pull very hard in order to take it out of the sleeve
customer_reviews.author: seekle

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Fits the surface Go perfect and cleans the screen
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel N

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This case has been through hell and back with me. It has protected my laptop through it all. It is waterproof and the flap that closes it also keeps the laptop in. Great purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Becker

customer_reviews.title: Only 13 inch laptop
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. It holds my 13 inch windows laptop. As well as mouse and charger. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: yvette Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for laptop
customer_reviews.text: Color and quality great. Faux leather feels more plastic but still a nice color. Love the felt and extra pocket
customer_reviews.author: sam

product_meta.title: WALNEW 13.5" Sleeve for 13.5 Inch Microsoft Surface Laptop 1/2/3(2017 & 2018 & 2019 Released) Protective Soft Sleeve Case Cover Bag with Safe Interior and Exterior Mouse Pad, Pink
feature_bullets: This Surface Laptop Case is designed for 13.5 Inch Microsoft Surface Laptop 2017, Surface Laptop 2 2018 and Surface Laptop 3 2019. For other laptop, please compare the size with the two models above

Dual Pocket Envelope Design: The main Compartement for your laptop. Front Pocket for books, tablets, cellphones or accessories like headphones and USB cables. Carry your necessities on the go with this portable notebook pouch

Durable & Protective. Stylish and secure artificial leather exterior offers exquisite texture, soft interior will not scratch your Notebook, not only prevents exposure to the outside elements but assures that none of the internal components are damaged by this finely crafted notebook sleeve
Come with a flip pad for a secure closure or works as a portable mouse pad when the laptop is out
As a convenient Notebook Sleeve, inserting and removing the device from this case's internal pouch is a breeze that requires little effort at all

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars613 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
